Купила эту игру очень давно. Наиграно почти 2 тысячи часов. В поддержку этой игры покупала скины за золотые клетки и все ивенты. А эти уроды заблокировали доступ в России, не понимая как грохнули себе продажи и рейтинги. Вы просто неблагодарные куски д..... Раз так поступаете с русским комьюнити, не осознавая о том, какую большую аудиторию теряют!

Didn't appeal to me at first, in fact, it's on my Shit Games on Steam (SGOS) category. However, after playing a few games recently as Legion (the only character that I actually want to play - all the others just don't appeal to me) I've been really enjoying it. From the Survivor's tutorial it seems really fun on that front too, and in general it's a surprisingly relaxing game.

(Also why tf is allowing comments turned off by default? That's dumb)
this game is very fun, intense, and has many different play styles to take advantage of.

It's a really good game, once you get an idea of what's a good team player in "Survivor". I'm not the best Killer, I play the Plague mostly and I really enjoy it. I'm a survivor main for sure, with all level 50 and a few prestiged, and it's definitely more fun with friends. It can be tilting to be tunneled, or left to die on your 1st hook by allies... but i think actually, it's a great game.

Dead by Daylight is a very fun game, honestly one of the best horror games out. The devs constantly work on improving the game. The community can be toxic but for the most part its fine. The biggest issue I have with the game is sometimes (especially as killer) it takes forever to find a game. Overall I give this game- 
4/5 for gameplay 
5/5 for graphics
2/5 for game load times
3/5 for glitches and bugs

I really enjoy this game, i play for fun most of the time. The chases are energetic on both killer and survivor and the feeling of either *finally* downing someone or somehow escaping feels amazing. Never expect to escape every time and never expect to kill everyone every time. Just try your best and do as much as you can. (ps try killer, it may seem overwhelming but its really fun, it took me a bit but i actually got 3 kills the other day, was good)

It's game with it's faults yet it does bring an interesting asymetrical game where teamwork and quick thinking will win a game or lead to a loss. As 4 have to try and complete objectives, with side objectives supplied based on who you're facing, in partially randomly generated maps. The feeling of predicting someones playstyle and tactic and adapting your to it is amazing and the challenge keeps me playing this game daily.

They destroyed the fun for old players with the movement and HUD update. I was ready to learn the new movement system but I was not ready for the out of context killer. He winks at you at the loading screen btw. I wish they just kept the game and made a new game. I miss the old days of having fun. Thanks for making me sick of a game that I used to love. At least I will have some free disk space now.

Gra bardzo ciekawa jest jedną z niewielu, która przykuła moją uwagę na dłużej.
Po rozegraniu 100h w grze sądzę iż gra jest warta polecenia chociaż czasami można się zirytować kiedy drużyna gra bardziej jak boty. Głównym problemem gry jest toksyczność graczy (zwłaszcza tych co grają zabójcą).
Mimo to, że gra ma wiele błędów i niedopracowani z czystym sumieniem mogę ją polecić.

juego altamente recomendado. si te gusta el terror y aparte cooperar con tus amigos o con otros jugadores. este es tu juego. si esta en oferta no dudes en comprarlo tiene una variedad muy buena de asesinos y supervivientes. muy completo el juego. las mecanicas de los asesinos le da variedad y riqueza a cada partida. lo unico negativo es que el factor miedo o terror solo lo sentiras cuando empieces a jugarlo, despues te acostumbras y el terror y miedo deja de ser el factor que te atrapa y pasara a hacerlo las mecanicas y las formas de jugar tanto de superviviente como de asesino. 10/10

Суть игры - 4 выживших должны завести 5ть генераторов, открыть выход и сбежать, пока игрок на маньяке всех убивает.
Начнем с минусов игры
-Токсичность, часто можно услышать гневные комментарии в свой адресс
-Стратегия маньяков (кемперство и туннелинг)
-Нет никаких чатов в матче
-Гемплей зайдет не каждому
-На низких рангах возможен долгий поиск игры
В целом игра мне нравится, постоянно вводятся различные маньяки и выжившие со своими особенностями и картами, фиксят баги, вводят баланс и тд. Лично мне гемплей не надоедает.Думаю в эту игру  играть с друзьями, это намного веселее. Перед покупкой советую посмотреть обзоры или просто гемплей игры, в избежании негативных эмоций.
